title: Shrubs and Grasses
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. The grasses range in height from less than a meter to nearly two meters tall in places. Small shrubs and stunted trees poke out of the grasses sporadically. Wildflowers grow among the grasses. The land is gently sloped down to the north, gently sloped down to the east, gently sloped down to the south, flat to the west.
